title: Simplifying ConvNets for Fast Learning
venue: International Conference on Artificial Neural Networks

tldr.text: This paper proposes different strategies for simplifying filters, used as feature extractors, to be learnt in convolutional neural networks (ConvNets) in order to modify the hypothesis space, and to speed-up learning and processing times.
